tasks.prompt: Fill out the contact form and include 'Customer Inquiry' as the subject

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to verify that the contact form was submitted with 'Customer Inquiry' as the subject, which is the specific requirement outlined in the task prompt. Ensuring that the subject is correctly set verifies that the task has been completed as intended.

use_case.name: Submit Contact Form With Subject
use_case.description: The user submits a contact form with a specific subject.

examples.prompt: Send a contact form with the subject 'Test Subject'

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with the specified subject.

tasks.prompt: Complete the contact form and add 'Hi, I am interested in learning more about your offerings' in the message section

message.value: Hi, I am interested in learning more about your offerings

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to verify that the contact form submission includes the specific message content as requested in the task prompt. This ensures that the Web Agent successfully completed the task by entering the correct message into the form.

use_case.name: Submit Contact Form With Message Content
use_case.description: The user submits a contact form with specific content in the message.

examples.prompt: Fill out the contact form and include 'Hello, I would like information about your services' in the message

message.value: Hello, I would like information about your services

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with the specific message content.

tasks.prompt: Fill out the contact form using the email 'user123@domain.com'

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test checks that the contact form was submitted using the specific email address 'user123@domain.com', as required by the task. It ensures that the web agent correctly filled out and submitted the form with the specified email, which is the primary objective of the task.

use_case.name: Submit Contact Form From Specific Email
use_case.description: The user submits a contact form from a specific email address.

examples.prompt: Complete the contact form using the email address 'test@example.com'

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted from the specified email address.

tasks.prompt: Fill out the contact form with the subject 'Product Feedback' and ensure the message mentions 'improvement suggestions'.

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test is necessary to verify that the contact form was submitted with the specific subject 'Product Feedback' and that the message includes the phrase 'improvement suggestions', as required by the task prompt. These criteria ensure that both the subject and message content are correctly captured and validated in the contact event.

use_case.name: Submit Contact Form With Subject and Message
use_case.description: The user submits a contact form with both a specific subject and message content.

examples.prompt: Send a contact form with subject 'Partnership Inquiry' and include the phrase 'potential collaboration' in your message

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with both the specified subject and message content.

tasks.prompt: Navigate to the contact form, enter 'Jane Doe' in the name field, use 'jane.doe@example.com' for the email, and send a message saying 'Looking forward to hearing from you about your products.'

message.value: Looking forward to hearing from you about your products.

tests.description: Check if specific event was triggered
tests.reasoning: This test verifies that the contact form was successfully submitted with the specified name, email, and message content. These fields are critical to ensure that the correct information was entered and submitted through the form.

use_case.name: Send Contact Form
use_case.description: The user navigates to the contact form page, fills out fields, and submits the form successfully.

examples.prompt: Send a contact form with the subject 'Test Subject'

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with the specified subject.

examples.prompt: Fill out the contact form and include 'Hello, I would like information about your services' in the message

message.value: Hello, I would like information about your services

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with the specific message content.

examples.prompt: Complete the contact form using the email address 'test@example.com'

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted from the specified email address.

examples.prompt: Send a contact form with subject 'Partnership Inquiry' and include the phrase 'potential collaboration' in your message

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with both the specified subject and message content.

examples.prompt: Go to the contact page and submit a form with name 'John Smith', email 'john@example.com', subject 'Feedback', and message 'Great website, I love the design'

message.value: Great website, I love the design

test.description: Verify that the contact form was submitted with all fields matching the specified values.
